text: Jiaru zhe shi linjin de liyi [qianmian you zhanlipin] he rongyi de luxing, tamen biding zhuisui ni, dan na juli [ta bu ke zhanyi] dui tamen tai yuanle. Tamen yi an la fashi:“Jiaru women you nengli, women yiding tong nimen yiqi chuzheng.” Tamen zi xun miewang. An la zhi dao, tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.
